Which one do you guys like better:

> You can access this file at the URL:
 http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator/files/SCEN0389a.bmp 
small thumbnail view of scen 389 from tevfifty

> You can access this file at the URL:
 http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator/files/SCEN0389.bmp 
large thumbnail view of scen 389 from tevfifty

[I choose Scenario #389 from the tevfifty because it's the smallest
map that I'm aware of to keep the file sizes small]

The small one is 25% of the size of the large one and roughly one
fourth of the file size.

Early experimentation indicated some of my scenarios such as #116 and
#122 ended up with a file size over 5 megabytes in the large version.

Or do you guys want to have both choices?

If you guys want both, I can make those two sizes and some more.

Bad news: For right now, I can only save the thumbnail images as bmp
files.

As soon as I hear some comments about size, I'll be updating Jesse again.
